reference: Dominitz, J, C. Manski, and B. Fischhoff (2001), Who are Youth At-Risk?: Expectations Evidence in the NLSY-97, in R. Michael (editor), Social Awakenings: Adolescents = Behavior as Adulthood Approaches, New York: Russell Sage Foundation, 230-257.
